name: Escaping over it
description:
So ur a prisoner , and u need to escape , thats it

the cops or enemys r space copes

the levels in this game r made to be played more then once to win it

caus when u play the game u can see if u need an ak , speed , more jumps , grenades , or nothing.

i know that this game is hard , but i honestly enjoy playing  one level again and again and again and again and again....... and u also should.
